name: Frost Blight
description:
EARLY ACCESS Snowball Fighting Rogue-Like

Join our Discord! https://discord.gg/mSwSrdr9qm

Strap up your snow boots and dive into this fast-paced rogue-like to defeat the endless hordes of frost-bitten zombies,  mysterious snow creatures, and other magical monsters. Get awesome upgrades like a backpack to store more snowballs, a scarf to increase your running ability, and a board that transitions from snow to ground!

Defeat the blight waves.

Collect magical flakes to use at the relic.

Use the relic to purchase upgrades and more!

How far can you get?

Content updated regularly so stay tuned!

This is an early access game. There may be bugs and unpolished features.
